about_the_game:
Elements: Path of the Wizard – is a card game in which you can determine the fate of an entire kingdom.

The action takes place in a magical medieval world: magic mirrors, unicorns, noble knights, beautiful ladies, cunning necromancers and fire-breathing dragons are at your service.
You are playing as the master magician. Every year dangerous and unpleasant events happen in the kingdom of Lemprob: fires, floods, pirate attacks, issues with poachers, dangerous accidents with royal heirs and more…
You will have assistants - royal advisors - who will bring you news from all corners of the country and the borderlands without any hesitation.
But only the chief magician is able to figure out which element will help him with this or that misfortune and flip the card in the right direction to save the kingdom.
One mistake and the very worst could happen, and the head wizard would be forced to resign.

Swipe cards, score points, collect useful items and stay alert!

The great kingdom is in great danger: it needs your help!

Can you rely on your court advisors?
You have power over all the elements: choose any one for the task at hand.

Magic is flexible and unstable - be ready to adjust your actions.

Use valuable items and ancient artifacts!
